full_summary:
## Pressure Vessel (V2) Supply and Delivery Contract

### Publication Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3577190839
* **Publication Date:** November 25, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 9, 2022 at 2:00 pm EST
* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Agency Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### Tender Details

* **Contract Title:** Pressure Vessel (V2)
* **UNSPSC Code:** 41103400 - Laboratory environmental conditioning equipment
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

### End User Information

* **End-User Entity:** Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **End-User Entity Address:** K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario K1Y4X2, Canada

### Contract Requirements

* The successful contractor must provide and deliver a pressure vessel for the thermally hydrolysis of animal by-products and food wastes into value-added commodities.
* The contractor must meet the specifications as outlined in Annex C, Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.
* The delivery date for the contractor to provide and deliver the pressure vessel is December 15, 2022.

### Bidder Information

* **Bidder Contact:** Zumbado Diaz, Willy (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Bidder Contact Email:** willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Bidder Contact Phone:** N/A
* **Bidder Subject Matter Expert:** Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
